PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2008-09362008-05-15,  FIN,  ,  , 
ActBank Act
PrecisNAME USE (FOREIGN BANKS) REGULATIONS by setting out the conditions of the permitted uses of a name or logo of a foreign bank by a Canadian entity associated with a foreign bank including a requirement to disclose that the foreign bank or entity associated with a foreign bank is not regulated in Canada as a financial institution, a bank holding company or an insurance holding company.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2008-0156 Publication Date: 2008-05-28
AttachmentsAttachment
